mapper.select: SELECT permission.role, teacher.teacherId, teacher.jobNumber, teacher.`password`, teacher.`name` FROM teacher INNER JOIN permission ON teacher.permissionId = permission.permissionId where jobNumber = #{param1}

SELECT teacher.teacherId, teacher.jobNumber, teacher.`password`, teacher.`name`, teacher.professional, teacher.longTel, DATE_FORMAT(teacher.employmentDate,'%Y-%c-%d') 'employmentDate', teacher.shortTel, teacher.email, teacher.dingding, teacher.wechat, teacher.sex FROM teacher where name = #{param1} and jobNumber = #{param2}
SELECT teacher.teacherId FROM teacher WHERE teacher.jobNumber = #{param1}
SELECT teacher.`name` FROM teacher WHERE teacher.teacherId = #{param1}
SELECT teacher.permissionId FROM teacher WHERE teacher.jobNumber = #{param1}
SELECT count(*) FROM `teacher` WHERE teacher.jobNumber = #{param1} AND teacher.password = #{param2}
mapper.update: update teacher set longTel = #{longTel}, shortTel = #{shortTel}, email = #{email}, dingding = #{dingding}, wechat = #{wechat} where jobNumber = #{jobNumber}
